priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Device Events Action Taken with Device Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C111110

self.title: CDISC SDTM Device Events Action Taken with Device Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist based on the action taken with respect to the device.
name: Device Events Action Taken with Device
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Device Events Action Taken with Device Terminology
synonyms: Device Events Action Taken with Device

terms.definition: The act of checking or adjusting (by comparison with a standard) the accuracy of a measuring instrument. (NCI)
The act of taking out, extracting, or withdrawing an entity from a location.
The act of rewriting program code or application software. (NCI)
